name: 2023-site
description: This is the `write.rog.gr` website re-designed for 2023. The original design was created in 2015 and with Jekyll rather than Hugo. Lots of things have changed then, so I decided that my site will need to change as well.

scripts.build:css:chroma: hugo gen chromastyles --style=catppuccin-mocha > assets/css/catppuccin-mocha.css && hugo gen chromastyles --style=catppuccin-latte > assets/css/catppuccin-latte.css
scripts.watch:site: hugo serve --bind $(system_profiler SPNetworkDataType -json | jq -r '.SPNetworkDataType[] | select(._name == "Wi-Fi") | .IPv4.Addresses[]') --baseURL http://$(system_profiler SPNetworkDataType -json | jq -r '.SPNetworkDataType[] | select(._name == "Wi-Fi") | .IPv4.Addresses[]')/

author: Roger Steve Ruiz <hi@rog.gr>
